title: Salt, ca. 1800–30
provenance: Delomosne and Son, Ltd., London; 1966 P. Warren, NY
description: Oval-shaped bowl on spreading faceted stem on thick diamond-shaped base; cut serrated top edge, sides molded with diamond and fluting pattern, bottom of base molded star pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Salt, ca. 1800–30.
ca. 1800–30. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-194.
